issue: Required 'response-transformer' plugin is not enabled, violating the Data Masking & Sensitive Headers Policy.
recommendedAction: Enable and configure the 'response-transformer' plugin to mask sensitive information and headers in API responses.
impact: Without response transformation, sensitive data may be inadvertently exposed in API responses, increasing risk of data leakage.
securityStandardReference: OWASP API Security Top 10 – API6:2019 (Sensitive Data Exposure)

issue: Required 'jwt' plugin is missing, violating policy for secure token-based authentication.
recommendedAction: Deploy the 'jwt' plugin to enforce JWT-based authentication and ensure only authorized clients access the APIs.
impact: Missing JWT authentication makes APIs vulnerable to unauthorized access and attacks, risking compromise of protected resources.
securityStandardReference: OWASP API Security Top 10 – API2:2019 (Broken User Authentication), NIST SP 800-53 IA-2
